amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to revoke certain exceptions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3433 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 168.

action.text: Amendment SA 3433 proposed by Senator Moran to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5339-5340; text: CR S5339) To prohibit the use of funds to revoke certain exceptions.
